Class Checkout

  • java.lang.Object
    • Checkout

  • public class Checkout
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains utility methods for preparing a purchase list and calculate final bill amount

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Set<Offer> offers
      Store list of offers
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Product> products
      Store individual product against sku ie list of all available products in the store
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> purchaseMap
      stores purchase list against sku, the map grows as the items are scanned
      private float sumBeforeDiscount
      Total amount of purchase before applying discount

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Checkout(PricingRules pricingRules)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float computeBill()
      Compute discount by traversing the purchase list with every offer available this way we can apply multiple offers on a single purchase
      void scan(java.lang.String item)
      Scan each item and compute total amount (without discount) so far

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
